body:
C++?

On Sun, Dec 11, 2016, 11:23 AM Vincentoo <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Trying to install the Ruby version of grpc on a Raspberry Pi... (Raspbian
> GNU/Linux 7 (wheezy))
> No success to far after many attempts:
>
>    - GCC 4.6: fatal error: stdalign.h: No such file or directory
>    - GCC 4.7: tons of errors in sockaddr_utils.c
>    eg. :98:17: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change
>    the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
>
> What can I try next?
> Or is that a lost cause?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you are subscribed to this thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/9056>, or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AJpudQwC7vL0TP42XHFDramnOa2mifeQks5rHE2dgaJpZM4LKAb5>
> .
>

Meaning...?

Some logs from the last attempt (using GCC 4.7):
```
/home/pi/.rbenv/versions/2.1.7/bin/ruby extconf.rb
Building internal gRPC into /opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1/src/ruby/ext/grpc/libs/opt
make: Entering directory '/opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1'
[C]       Compiling third_party/zlib/adler32.c
...
[C]       Compiling src/core/lib/surface/channel_init.c
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_is_wildcard':[C]       Compiling src/core/lib/surface/channel_ping.c

src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:98:17: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:109:17: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_make_wildcard4':
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:126:24: error: conversion to 'in_port_t' from 'unsigned int' may alter its value [-Werror=conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_make_wildcard6':
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:133:25: error: conversion to 'in_port_t' from 'unsigned int' may alter its value [-Werror=conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_to_string':
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:152:12: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:156:12: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_get_port':[C]       Compiling src/core/lib/surface/channel_stack_type.c

src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:199:14: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:201:14: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_set_port':
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:216:48: error: conversion to 'in_port_t' from 'unsigned int' may alter its value [-Werror=conversion]
src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:220:50: error: conversion to 'in_port_t' from 'unsigned int' may alter its value [-Werror=conversion][C]       Compiling src/core/lib/surface/completion_queue.c

[C]       Compiling src/core/lib/surface/event_string.c
cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
Makefile:2073: recipe for target '/opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1/src/ruby/ext/grpc/objs/opt/src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.o' failed
make: *** [/opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1/src/ruby/ext/grpc/objs/opt/src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.o] Error 1
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
make: Leaving directory '/opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1'
*** extconf.rb failed ***
```

Ok, so you're trying to build the Ruby extension?

On Mon, Dec 12, 2016, 1:48 AM Vincentoo <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Meaning...?
>
> Some logs from the last attempt (using GCC 4.7):
>
> /home/pi/.rbenv/versions/2.1.7/bin/ruby extconf.rb
> Building internal gRPC into /opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1/src/ruby/ext/grpc/libs/opt

>
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:98:17: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]

> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:133:25: error: conversion to 'in_port_t' from 'unsigned int' may alter its value [-Werror=conversion]
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_to_string':
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:152:12: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:156:12: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_get_port':[C]       Compiling src/core/lib/surface/channel_stack_type.c
>
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:199:14: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:201:14: error: conversion to 'int' from 'unsigned int' may change the sign of the result [-Werror=sign-conversion]
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c: In function 'grpc_sockaddr_set_port':
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:216:48: error: conversion to 'in_port_t' from 'unsigned int' may alter its value [-Werror=conversion]
> src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.c:220:50: error: conversion to 'in_port_t' from 'unsigned int' may alter its value [-Werror=conversion][C]       Compiling src/core/lib/surface/completion_queue.c
>
> [C]       Compiling src/core/lib/surface/event_string.c
> cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
> Makefile:2073: recipe for target '/opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1/src/ruby/ext/grpc/objs/opt/src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.o' failed
> make: *** [/opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1/src/ruby/ext/grpc/objs/opt/src/core/lib/iomgr/sockaddr_utils.o] Error 1
> make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
> make: Leaving directory '/opt/myhome-agent/shared/bundle/ruby/2.1.0/gems/grpc-1.0.1'
> *** extconf.rb failed ***
>

> You are receiving this because you commented.
>
>
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/grpc/grpc/issues/9056#issuecomment-266384956>, or mute
> the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AJpudYGW8do9Nm5kjwTzgeyg_LnNHS77ks5rHRh5gaJpZM4LKAb5>
> .
>

Yes. Initially I was just trying to deploy my Ruby app but it turned out that the Ruby gem manager (bundler) failed installing some of the necessary dependencies `google-cloud` gem because... this Ruby gem extension compilation was failing.
So right, now I am trying to "build the Ruby extension" via this command:
`bundle exec gem install grpc -v '1.0.1'`
with:
* Bundler version 1.7.9
* ruby 2.1.7p400 (2015-08-18 revision 51632) [armv6l-linux-eabihf]

Has there been any progress with this?
Months later and facing the same problem; that is, "fatal error: stdalign.h: No such file or directory" ......

Gem::Ext::BuildError: ERROR: Failed to build gem native extension.

    current directory: /usr/local/rvm/gems/ruby-2.3.3/gems/grpc-1.2.2/src/ruby/ext/grpc
/usr/local/rvm/rubies/ruby-2.3.3/bin/ruby -r ./siteconf20170414-14390-112v0cu.rb extconf.rb
Building internal gRPC into /usr/local/rvm/gems/ruby-2.3.3/gems/grpc-1.2.2/src/ruby/ext/grpc/libs/opt
make: Entering directory '/usr/local/rvm/gems/ruby-2.3.3/gems/grpc-1.2.2'
[C]       Compiling third_party/zlib/adler32.c

I'm having the same error as you, and if I try to install the grpc 1.2.2 I get an error aswell.
No idea what's wrong.
